Class FourWheeler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Vehicle
      • FourWheeler

  • public class FourWheeler
extends Vehicle

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_COST
      Maximum cost of any four wheeler which will be allowed in the race.
      Set to 45.
      static int FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_LENGTH
      Maximum length of any four wheeler which will be allowed in the race.
      Set to 20.
      static int FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_WIDTH
      Maximum width of any four wheeler which will be allowed in the race.
      Set to 10.

      • Fields inherited from class Vehicle

        cost, length, name, numWheels, width

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FourWheeler(java.lang.String name, int length, int width, int cost)
      Initialize numWheels to 4 and all the others from given arguments

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getInfo()
      Return String in 2 lines
      1st line - result of toString() of base class.
      2nd line - 'Wheels : Vehicle.numWheels'
      (without quotes)
      boolean verifyValidity()
      Verify the validity of the Four Wheeler
      A Four Wheeler is valid if its length and width are less than or equal to FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_LENGTH and FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_WIDTH respectively
      and its cost is less than or equal to FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_COST

    • Method Detail

      • verifyValidity

        public boolean verifyValidity()
        Verify the validity of the Four Wheeler
        A Four Wheeler is valid if its length and width are less than or equal to FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_LENGTH and FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_WIDTH respectively
        and its cost is less than or equal to FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_COST
        Specified by:
        verifyValidity in class Vehicle
        Returns:
        Return true if Vehicle is valid else return false
